statements: SELECT * FROM medication_orders WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medication_orders WHERE prescription_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM medication_orders WHERE dosage > 50 ORDER BY medication_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name FROM medication_orders WHERE patient_id = 3 AND dosage < 30 ORDER BY prescription_date DESC;
SELECT medication_name, prescription_date FROM medication_orders WHERE dosage >= 100 AND medication_name LIKE '%aspirin%';
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medication_orders WHERE order_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM medication_orders WHERE dosage > 50 ORDER BY prescription_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, prescription_date FROM medication_orders WHERE medication_name LIKE 'Aspirin%';

SELECT medication_name, dosage, prescription_date FROM medication_orders WHERE patient_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY dosage DESC, prescription_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM MedicationOrders WHERE order_id = 1;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, order_date FROM MedicationOrders WHERE patient_id = 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM MedicationOrders;
SELECT patient_id, doctor_id, medication_name, dosage, order_date FROM MedicationOrders WHERE doctor_id = 200 AND patient_id = 300;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM Prescriptions WHERE patient_id = 400 ORDER BY prescription_id ASC;

SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS order_count FROM MedicationOrders GROUP BY patient_id HAVING order_count > 2
